headline: Edgewater Wireless Issues 2026 Corporate Update
summary: OTTAWA, Ontario & SANTA CLARA, Calif., February 05, 2026--Edgewater Wireless Systems Inc. (TSXV: YFI) (OTC: KPIFF), the industry pioneer of AI-powered Wi-Fi Spectrum Slicing™ silicon solutions and IP for residential, enterprise and Industrial IoT markets, today issued a corporate update outlining the Company’s material progress over the past 12 months and its 2026 execution roadmap toward Wi-Fi8-ready silicon deliverables and strategic commercialization.

content.title: Edgewater Wireless Issues 2026 Corporate Update
